bug.author: srikris
bug.summary: .explore and .annotate both hang when an image column contains a missing value
bug.description: When there is an SFrame with an image column but contains a missing value, both .explore and .annotate hang <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1875987/58193016-e9158e80-7c76-11e9-8c64-31b97c1ffccf.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
<denchmark-code>In [37]: sf.explore() Materializing SFrame
